about lucyia

Hi,

my name is Lucia Kocincova a.k.a. lucyia. I love coding and designing, especially visualizations.

I'm a recent master graduate of Informatics with a specialization in graphic design who has already finished a couple of front-end development projects.

I've always wanted to combine computer science and design which resulted in my master's specialization in data visualization and my master thesis titled Interactive visualization methods for Sketch Engine which was awarded dean's prize for final thesis.

I'm eager to learn new technologies and work on new challenging projects, so do not hesitate to contact me.

design & code by lucyia
